title: The New Christopher Robin Trailer Hits All The Feels

og.title: The New Christopher Robin Trailer Hits All The Feels
og.description: A few months ago, we received a teaser trailer for the upcoming Christopher Robin film. It didn’t show a lot of the premise of the film, but what it did show was Winnie the Pooh in live action setting. While there were people the criticised how Pooh looked, the overall thoughts were positive. Having a […]
